text: Ðis synd Wihtrædes domas Cantwara cyninges.

Dam mildestan cyninge Cantwara Wihtræde rixigendum þe fiftan wintra his rices, þy niguðan gebanne, sextan dæge Rugernes, in þære stowe þy hatte Berghamstyde, ðær wæs gesamnad eadigra geheahtendlic ymcyme:
Ðær wæs Birhtwald, Bretone heahbiscop, & se ær næmda cyning; eac þan Hrofesceastre bisceop se ilca Gybmund wæs haten andward wæs;
& cwæð ælc had ciricean ðære mægðe anmodlice mid þy hersuman folcy.
Þær ða eadigan fundon mid ealra gemedum ðas domas & Cantwara rihtum þeawum æcton, swa hit hyr efter segeþ & cwyþ:
